title: Game Progress Route
content:
to the room as soon as they notice you.

Nine-Fingers Keene will tell you that she plans on burning the Absolute from the city, and if you want to help, she will welcome it. Now, you will get the following options to respond:

What can I do to help you? Why do I need to help the Guild? I've been doing well enough without you so far. You can help a companion of mine who needs information- Jaheira. I need information. I ran into some of your thugs- the Rivington Rats? Leave.

If you mention Jaheir
